entity.requestQueries.description: These are the פרמטרים passed in the URL. They are separated by '?' and by '&'.

entity.requestBody.description: This is the גוף of the בקשה. Usually used for POST and PUT requests.

entity.responseBody.description: This is the גוף of the תשובה. Typically presented in JSON format.

entity.requestHeaders.description: These are the כותרות passed in the בקשה. Usually used for authentication.

entity.requestHeader.description: This is the header passed in the בקשה. Typically used for authentication.

entity.requestQuery.description: This is the פרמטר passed in the URL. Separated by '?' and by '&'.

entity.responseHeaders.description: These are the כותרות passed in the תשובה. Usually used for authentication.

entity.response.description: This is the תשובה returned from the server.

entity.success.description: This is the תשובה returned when the בקשה is successful.

entity.failure.description: This is the תשובה returned when the בקשה fails.

entity.responseExample.description: This is an example of the תשובה returned from the server.

entity.authentication.description: This is the authentication required to initiate the בקשה.

message.free.description: Indicates that the price is חינם, no points or money are required to use the API שירות.

message.appliedCount.description: The number of times the API שירות has been applied for.

message.firstFree.description: Indicates that the first use of the API שירות is חינם, with no points or money required.

message.custom.description: Indicates that the price has been specified, requiring the use of specified points or money to use the API שירות.

message.present.description: We will present points to you when using the API שירות for the first זמן.

message.around.description: The price is approximately, actual price may vary.

message.successRate15min.description: The real זמן הצלחה אחוז of the API שירות in the past 15 דקות.

message.ySuccessRate.description: The הצלחה אחוז of the API שירות.

message.streamUsage.message: Friendly reminder: The above code may not be fully applicable for streaming requests. נא refer to the integration documentation for modifications.
message.streamUsage.description: The above code may not be fully applicable for streaming requests. נא refer to the integration documentation for modifications.

message.alphaStage.message: This API is in Alpha stage, an early preview גרסה which may have potential instability, and the API format may undergo significant changes. It is not recommended for use in production environments. Current pricing is relatively low, and significant price adjustments may occur in the future.
message.alphaStage.description: This API is in Alpha stage, an early preview גרסה which may have potential instability, and the API format may undergo significant changes. It is not recommended for use in production environments. Current pricing is relatively low, and significant price adjustments may occur in the future.

message.betaStage.message: This API is in Beta stage, the API format is not expected to change significantly, but there may be potential instability, use in production environments with caution. Current pricing is relatively low, and moderate price adjustments may occur in the future.
message.betaStage.description: This API is in Beta stage, the API format is not expected to change significantly, but there may be potential instability, use in production environments with caution. Current pricing is relatively low, and moderate price adjustments may occur in the future.

unit.GB.description: Gigabyte, a unit of digital information storage.

unit.MB.description: Megabyte, a unit of digital information storage.

unit.KB.description: Kilobyte, a unit of digital information storage.

unit.B.description: Byte, a unit of digital information storage.
